chart.name: chart.forecast.report.sales
chart.title: Previsional Sales
chart.dataset: SELECT self.estimatedDate as date, self.amount as amount FROM ForecastRecapLine self WHERE self.typeSelect = 1 AND self.forecastRecap.id = :_id ORDER BY estimatedDate

chart.name: chart.forecast.report.spending
chart.title: Previsional Spending
chart.dataset: SELECT self.estimatedDate as date, (self.amount * -1) as amount FROM ForecastRecapLine self WHERE self.typeSelect = 2 AND self.forecastRecap.id = :_id ORDER BY estimatedDate

chart.name: chart.forecast.report.marges
chart.title: Previsional Marges
chart.dataset: SELECT self.estimatedDate as date, SUM(self.amount) as amount FROM ForecastRecapLine self WHERE self.forecastRecap.id = :_id GROUP BY estimatedDate ORDER BY estimatedDate

chart.name: chart.forecast.in.out.total
chart.title: Forecasts in out total
chart.dataset: SELECT self.amount as amount, MONTH(self.estimatedDate) as month FROM ForecastRecapLine AS self INNER JOIN self.forecastRecap AS recap ON recap.isReport = true WHERE self.estimatedDate is not null AND (:bankDetails is null OR :bankDetails MEMBER OF recap.bankDetailsSet) AND (recap.userRecap = :_user OR :_user is null) AND self.estimatedDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate
